alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Pike; Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 19 at 5:44PM EDT until March 19 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Southwestern Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Central Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... West central Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 543 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sugar Notch, or near Wilkes-Barre, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Dunmore, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains, Old Forge, Pittston, Taylor and Plymouth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
